# Weak

generate borax stone
hardness 2.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/weak/borax
fragmentTexture strata:items/fragments/stone/mask erase 100 strata:items/fragments/stone/highlight screen 100 strata:items/fragments/stone/shadow multiply 100 strata:blocks/ore/weak/borax
convertsTo -
lang.en Borax
